page.title: 11Sunday Lunch In Wyndham
page.content: My mother buys her food from Mainstop in Bridgend. We usually have chicken or lamb, mint sauce, potatoes, cabbage, gravy, cauliflower, peas and yorkshire pudding. For afters we have rice pudding. She uses an electric mixer to make the pudding. She uses an electric cooker to cook the food. She gets it ready for 1.00 p.m. I put a tablecloth on the table then i put out the plate mats before putting out the knives and forks. Then i put the drinks of squash out. After that my mother puts the food on the table. After dinner my mother washes the dishes in the sink and she adds washing up liquid to the water. My mother uses the cloth to dry them.
